scripts.build: if [ -z "$UCP_UI_REVIEW_APP" ]; then npm run build:main; else npm run build:review; fi
scripts.heroku:review:setupEnv: npm run heroku:ucpUiReviewApp:envVars && npm run heroku:authService:envVars
scripts.heroku:ucpUiReviewApp:envVars: echo HEROKU_APP_NAME=$HEROKU_APP_NAME >> apps/ucp-ui/env/staging.env && echo UCP_UI_REVIEW_APP=$UCP_UI_REVIEW_APP >> apps/ucp-ui/env/staging.env
scripts.concurrently:start:services: concurrently "PORT=8089 npx ts-node --transpile-only apps/authentication-service/src/index.ts" "PORT=8088 npx ts-node --transpile-only apps/institution-service/src/app.ts" "node proxyServer.js"
